$comment: ANGULAR AI AGENT PROJECT - TYPESCRIPT CONFIGURATION REFERENCE
$comment2: This file demonstrates the key TypeScript configuration patterns used in this project.
$comment3: Based on: tsconfig.json from the root of the project

strict_mode_flags.strict: ✅ Enables all strict type checking options
strict_mode_flags.noImplicitReturns: ✅ Ensures all code paths return a value
strict_mode_flags.noFallthroughCasesInSwitch: ✅ Prevents accidental fallthrough in switch statements

compilation_settings.skipLibCheck: ✅ Skips type checking of declaration files for faster builds
compilation_settings.isolatedModules: ✅ Ensures each file can be safely transpiled alone
compilation_settings.importHelpers: ✅ Import helper functions from tslib to reduce bundle size

target_and_modules.target: ES2022 - Modern JavaScript features, good browser support
target_and_modules.module: preserve - Let bundler handle module system

angular_compiler_strict_options.enableI18nLegacyMessageIdFormat: false - Use new i18n message format
angular_compiler_strict_options.strictInputAccessModifiers: true - Strict input property access checking

project_references.pattern: Use project references for workspace organization

key_conventions: ✅ Enable ALL strict TypeScript options for type safety
✅ Use modern ES2022 target for good performance/compatibility balance
✅ Enable all Angular strict template options
✅ Use project references for workspace organization
✅ Skip lib checking for faster builds in development
✅ Enable experimental decorators for Angular support
✅ Use import helpers to reduce bundle size
development_benefits: Early error detection with strict mode
Safer refactoring with strict null checks
Better template type checking in Angular
